entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
